div.div: at New Wilmington, Pa. | Harold Burry Stadium

tr.td: Change of possession, WES ball on WES35, 1st and 10.
Westminster wins the toss, defers; Westminster defends south goal.
Justin Dahl kickoff 35 yards to the GEN30, Jake Olenick return 6 yards to the GEN36 (Travis Lauster).
Aaron Channing pass complete to Eric Lucich for loss of 2 yards to the GEN34 (Jaevon Hardy).
